title: Settings
description: Manage your shop's configuration and preferences.

general.title: General Information
general.description: Update your shop's public details and location management.

localization.title: Localization
localization.description: Set your region-specific currency, language, and timezone settings.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrency.footer: Exchange rates will be handled by an integrated service. Additional configuration may be required.

invoicing.title: Document Customization
invoicing.description: Customize your invoices, receipts, and purchase orders.
invoicing.footerPlaceholder: e.g., Thank you for your business! 90-day warranty on all used items.

template.title: Template Customization
template.description: Use the full template editor to modify the layout of printed documents using variables like `'{'{customer.name}'}'`.

taxes.title: Tax Settings
taxes.description: Configure default tax rates for sales.
taxes.inclusiveLabel: Prices entered are inclusive of tax

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.

automation.title: Automation Rules
automation.description: Set up rules to automate purchasing and other workflows.

purchasing.title: Automated Purchasing
purchasing.description: Automatically generate a draft Purchase Order when a specific item's stock falls below its reorder point.

workflow.title: Visual Workflow Automator
workflow.description: Create custom multi-step automations for any process, like sending an SMS to a customer when a repair is marked 'Completed'.

loyalty.title: Customer Loyalty Tiers
loyalty.description: Define custom loyalty tiers (e.g., Bronze, Silver, Gold) with different point multipliers and rewards.

security.title: Security & Roles
security.description: Manage user roles, permissions, and application security.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to all accounts.

roles.title: Custom Roles & Permissions
roles.description: Create new user roles and finely tune the exact permissions for each one.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Configure policies for data retention and archiving.

retention.label: Keep Sales Data For
retention.footer: Older data will be automatically archived to save space and improve performance. Archived data can still be accessed via historical reports.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Manage system-level settings. Use with caution.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.description: Puts the application into maintenance mode, disabling access for non-admins.

saved.title: Settings Saved
saved.description: Your changes have been saved successfully.
